A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually and musically\, this movie was stunning.  It is a feast for the eyes and ears.  That is why I scored it what I did.\n\nTake those elements away and this movie is a zero.  Does not behave in the right Star Wars elements.  Poor character development and just bad script.  I did not care for most of the new characters (except for the code hacker\, I was intrigued by him).  Not a great movie.
